description:
* Based on a shounen manga by http://anidb.net/cr21534 [Shimabukuro Mitsutoshi] serialised in http://anidb.net/cr5372 [Weekly Shounen Jump].
In a world where the taste and texture of food is extremely important there exist individuals known as Bishoku-ya (luxury food providers) who specialize in the acquisition of rare ingredients and animals. http://anidb.net/ch19496 [Toriko] is one of these hunters and it is his dream to find the most precious foods in the world and create the ultimate dinner course. As one of the most skilled hunters in the world he is regularly hired by restaurants and the rich to seek out new ingredients and rare animals. A man with inhuman ability, he utilizes his incredible strength and knowledge of the animal kingdom to capture ferocious, evasive and rare beasts to further his final goal, the ultimate dinner course composed of the most delicious food in the world. He is currently accompanied by a weak and timid chef who, inspired by Toriko`s ambition, travels with him to improve his culinary skills and find rare ingredients.
Note: The first episode is actually a 2 part special called Toriko x One Piece Collabo Special - a crossover with http://anidb.net/a69 [One Piece]. The first part aired on Toriko`s timeslot at 9:00 and the second part aired on One Piece`s timeslot at 9:30. That is also the reason why the second Toriko episode doesn`t continue where the first one left off.

REGULAR.description:
As Monkey D. Luffy and his crew are running low on food supplies, they discover an island known as the Gourmet Island. As Luffy, Nami, Sanji and Tony Tony Chopper explore the island and discover everything to be made of food, they encounter Toriko travelling with Komatsu, who initially mistake Chopper as potential food. After encountering some Roasted Boars and clearing up their misunderstandings, the two groups search for a large bird which Toriko and Luffy manage to beat. They spend the night sampling their spoils. However, Nami and Komatsu are kidnapped by a group of Cocoalas. As the gang head towards a mountain where a delicious fruit is said to exist and where the Cocoalas have taken Nami and Komatsu, the gang end up against a fierce group of lions, but are aided by Toriko`s allies: Sunny, Coco & Rin. They later find Nami and Komatsu being held captive by a giant Cocoala and work together to defeat it. Afterwards, an eruption occurs, revealing the entire island to be one giant dessert. After Luffy and crew gather the provisions they need, they set off on their journey as Toriko continues his search for his Full Course menu.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: Jouriku, Gourmet no Shima! Bishoku-ya Toriko Arawareru!
Landing, Gourmet Island! The Gourmet Hunter Toriko Appears!
上陸, グルメの島! 美食屋トリコ現る!

REGULAR.description:
The series begins with a chef named Komatsu discovering a Gourmet Hunter named Toriko, who catches a Pincer Fish, much to Komatsu`s amazement. After Toriko stops an attack on the fish by defeating a Five-Tailed Eagle, he is informed about a local Gararagator and accompanies Komatsu on his journey to the Baron Archipelago, a swamp where the animal lives. While there, Toriko scares off a Baron Tiger. Later, while eating Snake Frogs at dinner, a Swamp Snake suddenly appears but dies because of a large bite wound. However, they discover Baron Leeches on his body and is quickly eaten by the Gararagator, who reveals itself to be an oversized alligator. While fighting the Gararagator, Toriko discovers that it smells the scent of blood from the Baron Leeches. He eventually kills the Gararagator with his Fork and Knife technique. Toriko tells Komatsu of his intention to have a full-course menu while eating the Gararagator, while Komatsu tells his dream of becoming a world-renowned chef. Komatsu offers to come with Toriko, which he accepts.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: Hikyou no Kyojuu! Toriko, Gararawani o Hokaku Seyo!
The Undiscovered Giant Beast! Toriko, Capture a Gararagator!
秘境の巨獣! トリコ, ガララワニを捕獲せよ!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko is commissioned by the International Gourmet Organization to obtain the Rainbow Fruit, which is guarded by powerful Troll Kongs. As he and Komatsu make their way into the enclosed Biotope, news reporter Tina sneaks in to try and get footage of Toriko in action. Toriko encounters a scout and knocks him out with a stun gun, since he does not kill what he does not intend to eat, though gets licked with its scent. Toriko soon encounters a group of Troll Kongs guarding the Rainbow Fruit tree. As Toriko confronts them, the rain washes off the scent from the underling, allowing him to use his intimidation against the others and gain dominance over its leader. Toriko takes a single fruit, though Tina is caught and her footage is confiscated. Moved by the ever-changing flavors of the Rainbow Fruit, served in a jelly by Komatsu, Toriko declares the Rainbow Fruit as the dessert for his full-course menu. Meanwhile, various shady figures become interested in Toriko`s movements.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: Houjun Naru Nanairo no Kajuu! Niji no Mi o Tore!
The Well Mellowed 7-Colored Fruit Juice! Pick the Rainbow Fruit!
芳醇なる七色の果汁! 虹の実をとれ!

REGULAR.description:
As the rare Puffer Whale makes its appearance once in every ten years, Toriko and Komatsu go to meet the chefs that prepare its meat. Upon arriving at their destination, they meet one of the Four Heavenly Kings, Coco, to request his help in capturing and preparing the Puffer Whale. Together they enter a cave labrynth in search of the Puffer Whale, though Coco predicts Komatsu might die. It is revealed that Coco`s body contains several types of poison which ward away beasts, but has also made him a target for those interested in the antibodies he produces. As they approach the beach, Komatsu goes missing and Toriko and Coco are approached by the fearsome Devil Snake.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: Prepare It! The Poisonous Puffer Whale! The Heavenly King Coco Appears!
Sabake Moudoku Fugu Kujira! Shitennou Koko Toujou!
さばけ猛毒フグ鯨! 四天王ココ登場!

REGULAR.description:
The Devil Snake`s cries cause the entrance to the cave to cave in, and its acid spitting and regenerative abilities prove difficult for Toriko and Coco. Meanwhile, Komatsu is taken captive by another hunter looking for the Puffer Whale. As Coco tries to distract the Devil Snake so Toriko can gather power, he is injected with its venom. However, he manages to make some antibodies for it and inject them into the snake along with his own poison, allowing Toriko to unleash his 5-Fold Spiked Punch on it. As Toriko contemplates what to do with the meat, Komatsu and his kidnapper encounter another Demon Devil Snake.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: Doukutsu no Shitou! Ute, Go Ren Kugi Panchi
The Deadly Cave Battle! Fire, Five-Fold Spiked Punch!
洞窟(どうくつ)の死闘! 打て, 5連釘パンチ!

REGULAR.description:
As the kidnapper leaves Komatsu at the mercy of the Demon Devil Snake only to be killed by some other creatures, Komatsu uses a special firecracker given to him by Toriko, but the sound from it causes Komatsu`s heart to stop. However, he is rescued by an old man they had met on the train named Jirou, who is a Knocking Master, knocking out the snake and reviving Komatsu. After reuniting with Komatsu, Toriko`s group reach a sandy beach in the cave, where they find a school of small Puffer Whales. After Coco uses his technique of hiding his presence to catch one whale, Toriko is able to copy it and catch more. After catching a few, Coco has Komatsu prepare the whales to have their poisonous glands removed and, despite poisoning all but one of the whales, Komatsu manages to save the last one, preparing it into sashimi and sake. Afterwards, they spot a strange creature with a fearsome aura emerge from the water, leaving with some more Puffer Whales.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: Nokkingu no Tatsujin! Fugukujira, Bishoku no Toki!
The Knocking Master! Time to Taste the Puffer Whale!
ノッキングの達人! フグ鯨, 実食の時!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko, Komatsu and Coco exit the cave and find the creature had beaten up all the other hunters. Later, Tina is suspended from her job as her camera had been confiscated by the IGO due to footage on the strange creature, known as a GT Robo, which has also been attacking Biotopes and stealing Rainbow Fruit. As the IGO prepare the release of a Gourmet Hunter named Zebra in preparation for a certain enemy, Toriko and Komatsu travel to one of the Biotopes to capture the Regal Mammoth. They meet up with Chief Mansam, who tells about the Gourmet Corps, the evil organisation trying to take control of the world`s ingredients and is targeting the Regal Mammoth. They then head to the Gourmet Colloseum where they view the main event, a battle royale between various creatures, including the legendary Battle Wolf. However, something goes wrong and the colloseum is filled with Battle Fragrance that causes the beasts to go wild and attack the Battle Wolf. Toriko decides to enter the arena and appears before the Battlewolf.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: Saidai Saikyou no Ookami! Battle Wolf, Fukkatsu
The Strongest Wolf That Ever Lived! The Battle Wolf Is Reborn!
最大最強の狼! バトルウルフ, 復活!

REGULAR.description:
As Toriko confronts the Battle Wolf, the crowd is shocked to discover Toriko`s appearance. Mansam discovers that Toriko entered the arena through the glass walls. Meanwhile, Tina discovers Komatsu and Mansam while filming the fight. Toriko frightens the other beasts away. The Battle Wolf collapses from exhaustion, but Toriko continues to fight the beasts. Mansem orders Rin to shut down the Battle Fragrance machine, but it continues to pour out Battle Fragrance as the machine malfunctions. Toriko manages to defeat a beast with his 5-Fold Spiked Punch technique, destroying most of the dome. Toriko announces the arrival of a new Battle Wolf. Meanwhile, Rin tries to tranquil a Demon Devil Python, but she is chased by the beast. Mansem tells Komatsu that the Battle Wolf has the Gourmet Cells, which can produce a clone of a beast. Rin leads the Demon Devil Python to the arena, where Toriko confronts the beast. Mansem confronts Dohem, whose true form is Bei. Bei defeats Mansem, while the Battle Wolf easily defeats the Demon Devil Python. Toriko then confronts Bei, who tells him that he will not be interested in eating a Battle Wolf and incapacitates the Battle Wolf with a single blast from the GT Robot.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: Arawareta Kyoui! Haran, Gurume Koroshiamu!
The Threat Appears! Rumble at the Gourmet Coliseum!
現れた脅威! 波乱, グルメコロシアム!

REGULAR.description:
Komatsu discovers that Mansem can heal himself by disinfecting his wounds. Bei tries to attack the Battle Wolf and her cub, but Rin uses the Endorphin Smoke technique on him. Mansem informs Komatsu that the Battle Wolf has given love to her cub which has been passed down for generations, and that a GT Robot can be manipulated by a human. Enraged at the near-death of the Battle Wolf, Toriko activates his gourmet cells and confronts the GT Robot. Toriko uses his Five-Fold Spike Punch and Ice Pick techniques on the GT Robot in a futile attempt to destroy it. The GT Robot attempts to kill Toriko, but he uses the Five-Fold Ice Pick Spiked Punch technique on the GT Robot - destroying its head. Mansem orders his men to fire the laser cannons on the robot, revealing its core antenna. The antenna flees from the attacks, but is obliterated by the beast Ricky. The Battle Wolf dies while standing up and Toriko, having befriended the cub, names him Terry Cloth. While eating, Toriko and Komatsu discovers that the Regal Mammoth has been stolen. Rin tells them that her brother has captured a Regal Mammoth on an island.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: That Which Is Passed Down! Activate, Gourmet Cells!
Uketsugareru Mono! Kassei, Gourmet Saibou!
受け継がれるもの! 活性, グルメ細胞!

REGULAR.description:
After defeating the GT Robot, Toriko, Mansem, Tina and Komatsu discover a Regal Mammoth. The Gourmet Hunter says that the Mammoth has been called a food treasure. However, a stranger defeats a group of Gang Hoods when they try to steal the Regal Mammoth. The stranger reveals that his name is Sunny and is a member of the Four Heavenly Kings. Mansem tells the group that the Regal Mammoth is a child and their parents are somewhere on the island. At Mansem`s request, Toriko and the others search for the adult Regal Mammoth. Meanwhile, the Gourmet Corps learn of Bei`s failure to defeat Toriko and steal the Regal Mammoth. Toriko and the others discover Black Grass and Sunny tells the group his full course meal. Toriko tells Komatsu that the IGO has 8 worlds with different environments and beasts. However, the group discovers the giant Rock Drums. Toriko uses his Five-Folt Spiked Punch technique on the beasts and Sunny eventually the last one with the Hair Net: Spatula technique. Mansem learns that a GT Robot has invaded the island.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: Muteki no Ryouiki o Motsu Otoko! Sono Na wa Sunny!
The Man Who Has an Invincible Domain! His Name Is Sani!
無敵の領域を持つ男! その名はサニー!

REGULAR.description:
While the villainous GT Robots continue their search for mammoth meat, Torkio has his hands full battling an ornery Obasaurus, and Komatsu learns the powerful secrets of the Gourmet Cells!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Regal Isle Dash! Search for the Jewel Meat!
Shissou, Regal-tou! Jewel Meat o Mezase!
疾走, リーガル島! ジュエルミートを目指せ!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko`s daring attempt to navigate the Devils` Playground brings him face-to-face with a Soldier Frog, an Axeox, and an Avian Beast with hallucinogenic breath! Meanwhile, a GT Robot stalks the Regal Mammoth!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ma no Game! Devil Athletic o Clear Shiro!
The Devils` Game! Clear the Devils` Playground!
魔のゲーム! デビルアスレチックをクリアしろ!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko`s quick thinking saves Sunny and Komatsu from being crush by a mammoth, but there are greater threats looming. A giant GT Robot is ready to rumble, and the Gourmet Hunters are all out of strength!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Saikyou no Suketto! Gekitotsu, Coco tai GT Robo!
The Ultimate Backup! Clash, Coco Vs. GT Robot!
最強の助っ人! 激突, ココ対GTロボ!

REGULAR.description:
While Toriko searches for the priceless Jewel Meat, Sunny and Coco wage separate battles against deadly GT Robots! Will Sunny`s hair leash and Coco`s poison rifle be enough secure victory?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyoui no Moudoku! Coco, Shouri e no Houteishiki
The Threat of Deadly Poison! Coco`s Formula for Victory!
脅威の猛毒! ココ, 勝利への方程式

REGULAR.description:
Sunny`s battle with the GT Robot is complicated by the arrival of a Mega Octopus, and something extremely evil hunts Toriko and his famished friends!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyoujin Naru Bigaku! Sunny, Otoko no Tatakai!
The Unyielding Aesthetic! Sunny`s Manly Battle!
強靭なる美学! サニー, 男の闘い!

REGULAR.description:
Rin`s tragic end sends Toriko into a rage, but the price of fueling his passionate attack may cost him his life. Meanwhile, Komatsu takes a heroic stand when the GT Robot tries to rob the chef of his favorite knife!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rin, Saigo no Negai! Kakusei Seyo, Chou (Super) Toriko!!
Rin`s Final Wish! Awaken, Super Toriko!
リン, 最期の願い! 覚醒せよ, 超(スーパー)トリコ!!

REGULAR.description:
A bite of the delicious Jewel Meat energizes Torkio, who uses a vicious Ten-Fold Spike Punch to put the hurt on a GT Robot! When the dust finally settles on the battlefield, dinner will be served!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chou Toriko, Ikari no Kobushi! Korega Saikyou no Kugi Panchi!
Super Toriko, the Fists of Anger! This Is the Strongest Spike Punch!
超トリコ, 怒りの拳! これが最強の釘パンチ!

REGULAR.description:
Komatsu must find an exquisite sauce to top a dish of very rare fish, and Toriko prepares to venture deep into the deadly Wu Jungle in search of food fit for a Battle Wolf!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: DNA ni Kizama Reta Aji! Toriko, BB (Blue Blood) Koun o Sagase!
DNAに刻まれた味! トリコ, BB(ブルーブラッド)コーンを探せ!
The Taste Written in His DNA! Toriko, Search for the BB Corn!

REGULAR.description:
Time is running out for Komatsu to complete his fishy dish, and Toriko watches as Terry faces off against a beastly Zombie Wood. Will the Battle Wolf show his true power - or fall to his ferocious foe?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tatakai no Sainou! Misero Terry, Ouja no Soshitsu!
The Talent of Battle! Show Me, Terry, King in the Making!
闘いの才能! 見せろテリー, 王者の素質!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko and Terry finally find the deliciously elusive BB Corn, and Komatsu must depend on a special blend of spices to survive an encounter with a giant lizard!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: For Terry`s Sake! Burst by Broiling Heat, BB Corn!
Terii no Tame ni! Shakunetsu de Hajikero, BB Koun!
テリーの為に! 灼熱(しゃくねつ)で弾けろ, BBコーン!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko must take his powers to the next level if he hopes to defeat a ravenous assassin from the Gourmet Corps. Elsewhere, Komatsu learns of the legendary ingredient with the power to stop - or start - wars!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bishokukai no Shikaku! Toriko no Waza, Shinka no Shunkan!
The Gourmet Corp. Assassin! The Moment Toriko`s Techniques Evolve!
美食會(びしょくかい)の刺客! トリコの技, 進化の瞬間!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko continues his battle with the corn-stealing, straw-wielding villain known as Grinpatch, and Komatsu desperately races to make it home before a rare dish of fish becomes nothing more than bubbles!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyouki no Atsuryoku! Grinpatch Tai Toriko!
Pressure of Madness! Grinpatch Vs. Toriko!
狂気の圧力! グリンパーチ対トリコ!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko and Komatsu travel to the city of culinary dreams for a special dinner with a living gourmet legend! Elsewhere, the sinister Gourmet Corps reveal the secrets behind their desperate desire for the Jewel Meat!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shokuji no Yuuenchi! Manpuku Toshi Gourmet Town!
The Amusement Park of Eating! The Bellyfull City, Gourmet Town!
食事の遊園地! 満腹都市グルメタウン!

REGULAR.description:
Komatsu and Toriko are treated to an ultra-exclusive tour of Setsuno`s kitchen, including the top secret area where she prepares Century Soup! Inspired, they set off in search of the genuine article, but trouble lies ahead!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dreamtime! Setsuno`s Century Soup!
Yume no Jikan! Setsuno no Century Soup!
夢の時間! 節乃のセンチュリースープ!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko, Komatsu, and a ravenous army of Gourmet Hunters set off in search of the legendary Century Soup. Their journey will take them to Ice Hell, but they`ll have to survive a Sharkrocodile attack to arrive in one piece!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Deai no Sakaba! Gunyuukakkyo no Bishokuya-tachi!
Meeting at the Saloon! Rivalry Between Gourmet Hunters!
出会いの酒場! 群雄割拠の美食屋達!

REGULAR.description:
Tundra Dragons and killer icicles are just a few of the obstacles standing between Toriko and the Century Soup. If the elements don`t kill him, there is a mean, green, GT Robot waiting to finish the job!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bishokuya Gundan no Chousen! Jouriku, Gokkan no Jigoku!
Challenge of the Gourmet Hunter Army! Disembarking at Freezing Hell!
美食屋軍団の挑戦! 上陸, 極寒の地獄!

REGULAR.description:
Zonge stumbles upon a group of angry Growlruses, Toriko and company go head-to-head with a herd of ferocious Freezer Bison, and a villainous vice chef unleashes an army of beastly insects!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hurry While It`s Hot! A Survival Race on Ice!
Zen wa Isoge! Hyoudo no Survival Race!
膳は急げ! 氷土[ひょうど]のサバイバルレース!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko and Komatsu team up to turn a deadly Silver Grizzly into a scrumptious soup. A villainous member of the Gourmet Corps is hot on their trail, but help is on the way in the form of a Heavenly King!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hyouzan Yurugasu Bakuen! Fukumen Otoko no Shoutai!
The Explosive Fire Shakes Ice Mountain! The Identity of the Masked Man!
氷山揺るがす爆炎! 覆面男の正体!

REGULAR.description:
When Toriko`s hand is frozen solid during a deadly encounter with a Gourmet Corps bug tamer, the burden of collecting the Century Soup falls squarely on the small shoulders of Komatsu! Is the little chef up to such a big task?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Glorious Bug Tamer! Tommyrod vs Toriko!
Ranmannaru Mushi Tsukai! Tommyrod tai Toriko!
爛漫なる蟲使い! トミーロッド対トリコ!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko fights to survive a deadly swarm of insects, and Takimaru fights for his life against an unbreakable opponent. Meanwhile, Komatsu`s quest to collect the Century Soup is monitored by GT Robot!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gratitude and Pride! Takimaru`s Full-Out Corkscrew Shot!
Kansha to Hokori! Takimaru, Konshin no Sennuki Shot!
感謝と誇り! 滝丸, 渾身の栓抜きショット!

REGULAR.description:
Takimaru relies on lessons from his past to settle the score with his flexible foe, and Match puts his blade to the ultimate test against an opponent clad in Crash Turtle armor!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ketchaku! Match to Takimaru Sutemi no Oowaza!
Settled! Match and Takimaru`s Desperate Attacks!
決着! マッチと滝丸捨て身の大技!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko heats things up in a heroic attempt to end the insect onslaught! Elsewhere, Komatsu finally reaches the location of the Century Soup - only to find that there is no soup!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shoku no Saisei-ya to Densetsu no Soup no Yukue!
The Gourmet Reviver and the Legendary Soup`s Location!
食の再生屋と伝説のスープの行方!

REGULAR.description:
Komatsu learns the amazing truth about his mysterious new friend, and Toriko relies on the power of his Gourmet Cells to even the odds in his brutal showdown with Tommyrod!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Head-on Fight! Fierce Battle! Toriko vs. Tommyrod!
Makkou Shoubu! Gekitou Toriko tai Tommyrod!
真っ向勝負! 激闘トリコ対トミーロッド!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko attempts to end his epic battle with Tommyrod by unleashing a Thirteen-Fold Spike Punch, but the bug tamer counters by revealing the true depths of his devious strength!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ultimate Desperation! Tommyrod`s Full-Power Mode Explodes!
Zettai Zetsumei! Tommyrod Honki Mode Sakuretsu!
絶体絶命! トミーロッド本気モード炸裂!

REGULAR.description:
The sudden arrival of a powerful Gourmet Reviver prompts Tommyrod to shed his skin, giving birth to a monstrous Parasite Emperor! The buggy beast is big and bad, but will he survive a bout with Hellboros, the ruler of Ice Hell?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyoui no Chikara! Saisei-ya Teppei Sansen!
Wondrous Power! Gourmet Reviver Teppei Joins the Battle!
驚異の力! 再生屋鉄平参戦!

REGULAR.description:
Komatsu is crushed by his failure to capture the Century Soup, but Teppei has one more amazing trick up his sleeve. With evil forces bearing down on them, will any our heroes live to tell of their adventure?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Saigo no Itteki! Century Soup wa Dare no Te ni!?
The Last Drop! Who Will Get the Century Soup?!
最後の一滴! センチュリースープは誰の手に!?

REGULAR.description:
After being rescued by Granny Setsu, the weary and wounded adventures set a course for the healing country known as Life. Toriko has an arm to regenerate, and Komatsu is eager to recreate the Century Soup!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Farewell, Ice Hell! Granny Setsu`s Hidden Power!
Saraba Ice Hell! Setsu-baa no Himetaru Chikara
さらばアイスヘル! セツ婆の秘めたる力

REGULAR.description:
Toriko`s gang arrives in the healing country of Life, an amazing land of curative creatures that can treat almost any ailment. After a chance meeting with Sunny, the group visits Teppei`s master, a renowned - and rowdy - Reviver.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Goukai Chiryou! Saisei-ya Yosaku Toujou!
Splendid Healing! Here Comes the Gourmet Reviver, Yosaku!
豪快治療! 再生屋・与作登場!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko`s recovery progresses faster than expected, but the strain of growing a new arm may cost him his life. Meanwhile, Komatsu struggles to find the final ingredient for his Century Soup!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyousou! Toriko no Kanchi ka Komatsu no Soup ka!?
Race to Finish! Will It Be Toriko`s Recovery, or Komatsu`s Soup?!
競争! トリコの完治か小松のスープか!?

REGULAR.description:
With the help of an unusual ingredient, Komatsu finally completes the Century Soup! Thanks to the little chef`s big accomplishment, Toriko may get his arm back - and add an ingredient to his Full Course Menu of Life!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shifuku no Sekai e! Jisshoku Century Soup
To the World of Ultimate Bliss! Taste the Century Soup!
至福の世界へ! 実食センチュリースープ

REGULAR.description:
Toriko returns home only to discover that his house has been eaten! Looks like it`s time to call the candy architect and start gathering delicious ingredients for a new place to rest his head!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Housewarming Party! Everyone Gather at the Sweets House!
Shinchiku Iwai! Sweets House ni Zen`in Shuugou!
新築祝! スイーツハウスに全員集合!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko, Sunny, and Coco set out on a death-defying quest to see who can track down the most irresistible sweets for a starving Seven-Colored Nellie!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bishoku Ou Ketteisen! Kyuukyoku no Sweets o Sagase!
The Gourmet King Championship! Search for the Ultimate Sweets!
美食王決定戦! 究極のスイーツを探せ!

REGULAR.description:
Sharkbox Turtles, Honey Dragons, and a Chomp Urchin plague the Heavenly Kings in their mission to feed the Seven-Colored Nellie. Can they survive this perilous quest and satisfy the starving beast?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bonding Dish! Partners Are Forever!
Kizuna no Ippin! Partner wa Eien ni
絆の一品! パートナーは永遠に

REGULAR.description:
Toriko tests out his new battle techniques - and his brand new arm - in a ferocious fistfight with the IGO President! Though his strength has improved, Toriko will need more training before he`s ready for the Gourmet World!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hakunetsu! Toriko tai IGO Kaichou!
White Hot! Toriko vs. the IGO President!
白熱! トリコ対IGO会長!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko begins his training with a mission to collect the delicious Ozone Grass. Komatsu is along for the ride, but is the little chef ready for brutal battles against Flying Sea Lions, Air Gorillas, and a Killer Bean Tree!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tenkuu no Yasaibatake Vegetable Sky!
Vegetable Garden in the Heavens! Vegetable Sky!
天空の野菜畑・ベジタブルスカイ!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko and Komatsu continue their quest to collect the Ozone Grass, but their journey only grows more difficult. Before they arrive at the garden in the sky, they must pass through a deadly thunderstorm!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Discovery! The King of Vegetables, Ozone Grass!
Hakken! Yasai no Ousama Ozon-sou!
発見! 野菜の王様オゾン草!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko and Komatsu finally reach the Ozone Grass, but the legendary ingredient proves challenging to harvest. As the culinary adventurers struggle to satisfy their appetites, something sinister watches the scene unfold!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Confession in the Heavens! The Formation of the Invincible Duo!
Oozora no Kokuhaku! Fumetsu no Combi Kessei!
大空の告白! 不滅のコンビ結成!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko realizes that there is a unique wild beast that learns quickly by looking from others. After fulfilling the request from IGO`s president, he comes back and Ichiro realizes Komatsu`s ability to hear ingredients voice. Toriko also asks regarding the creature that he found in the sky garden but Ichiro ignores him. Ichiro also requests tons of other ingredients to prepare Toriko for entering gourmet world. Meanwhile other four heavenly kings have received their assignments accepts for Zebura in which currently in prison. Ichiro tells Toriko that it is OK to invite other heavenly kings to capture the requested ingredients as for training. Ichiro invites them to go to Gourmet World to enjoy unknown ingredients.
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: Shocking Encounter! A Mysterious Life Form Appears!
Shougeki no Deai! Nazo no Seibutsu Arawaru!
衝撃の出会い! 謎の生物現る!

REGULAR.description:
Eager to test his new abilities in the Gourmet World, Toriko ignores the warnings of his closest friends and goes in search of adventure! Meanwhile, Komatsu is shocked by an unexpected visitor!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Toriko Rushes In! The Truth of the Gourmet World!
Toriko Totsunyuu! Gourmet-kai no Shinjitsu!
トリコ突入! グルメ界の真実!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko is in the edge of danger by meeting animals which have immesureable capture level - currently - in the Underground Forest. He also meets tons of new ingredients that will be explained by his savior, Knocking Master Jirou. Jirou also tells him that he cannot rush on the training process for entering the Gourmet World, and he also tells that Komatsu is the one that requests his aids. Toriko begins to realize and regret regarding his actions for trying to conquer Gourmet World alone. He meets Komatsu to tell him that he is fine, and Komatsu cries out of joy. He begins for his next training - From Comics will be Melk`s Stardust.
Source Wikipedia

titles.title: Enter the Astounding Ringer! The True Meaning of a Partner!
Kyoui no Suketto Toujou! Partner no Shin no Imi
驚異の助っ人登場! パートナーの真の意味

REGULAR.description:
After catching a Spring Shark, Toriko and Komatsu are surprised to see Luffy come tumbling out its mouth.  Luffy needs the gourmet hunter help to save a valuable crew member.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Saikai Toriko to Luffy! Kaisen no Mi o Sagase!
The Reunion of Toriko and Luffy! Find the Seafood Fruit!
再会トリコとルフィ! 海鮮の実を探せ!

REGULAR.description:
When Komatsu breaks his favorite knife, he and Toriko set out to find a famed craftsman who is said to forge the strongest blades imaginable. Their journey - plagued by Rock Wolves and Scale Kongs - will not be easy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shock! The Broken Kitchen Knife and Cutler Melk!
Shougeki! Oreta Houchou to Togishi Melk!
衝撃! 折れた包丁と研ぎ師メルク!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko and Komatsu are shocked by who they find waiting at the home of Cutler Melk, and the legendary Gourmet Hunter`s brash nature quickly leads to a knife fight!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kinpaku! Toriko no Knife tai Melk-bouchou!
Tension! Toriko`s Knife vs. Melk`s Knife!
緊迫! トリコのナイフ対メルク包丁!

REGULAR.description:
Komatsu spends some quality time with Cutler Melk`s apprentice, and Toriko delves deeper into the depths of Heavy Hole, where the gravity is intense and the Barbamoths are fierce!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chou Juuryoku! Heavy Hole o Kouryaku seyo!
Supergravity! Conquer Heavy Hole!
超重力! ヘビーホールを攻略せよ!

REGULAR.description:
The intense gravity of Heavy Hole pushes Toriko`s body to the breaking point. Back on the surface, Komatsu makes a shocking discovery about Culter Melk`s apprentice!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hidden Truth! The First Melk Appears!
Kakusareta Shinjitsu! Shodai Melk Arawaru!
隠された真実! 初代メルク現る!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko delves into the various mysterious of Cutler Melk, including his unusual voice, and Komatsu uses his culinary skills to give Melk`s apprentice a confidence boost!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Debut! The Second Generation`s Succession and Melk Stardust!
Ohirome! Nidaime Shuumei to Melk no Hoshikuzu!
御披露目! 二代目襲名とメルクの星屑!

REGULAR.description:
While Melk`s apprentice works tirelessly to craft a special knife for Komatsu, the little chef and Toriko wait eagerly for the job to be finished - and the feast to begin!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Work Made with All Her Might! The Completed Melk Knife!
Konshin no Issaku! Kansei Melk-bouchou!
渾身の一作! 完成メルク包丁!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko and Komatsu take a trip on the luxurious Gourmet Carriage, but there`s more to this vacation than sight-seeing and fine food. The adventurous duo is headed for the gates of hell!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chou Celeb! Gourmet Basha no Yume no Tabi!
Super Celeb! Once-in-a-Lifetime Gourmet Carriage Journey!
超セレブ! グルメ馬車の夢の旅!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko and Komatsu explore the despicable depths of Honey Prison as they make their way to the one called Zebra. Dare they hope to survive such a deafening encounter!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Finally, He Appears! The Last of the Four Kings, Zebra!
Tsui ni Toujou! Saigo no Shitennou Zebra!
遂に登場! 最後の四天王ゼブラ!

REGULAR.description:
The one they call Zebra is released from prison just in time for Monster Season and a showdown with the horrifying Forrest Goblin! After he eats lunch, of course!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bakuon Kaihou! Shikeishuu Zebra no Shussho!
Unleashed Roar! Death Row Zebra`s Release!
爆音解放!! 死刑囚ゼブラの出所!!

REGULAR.description:
Komatsu voices his concerns about travelling with such a dangerous criminal, and Zebra makes some new friends after a slugfest with a savage scorpion!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keihou Hatsurei! Zebra Sand Garden ni Jouriku!
Warning! Zebra Has Disembarked at the Sand Garden!
警報発令! ゼブラ サンドガーデンに上陸!

REGULAR.description:
A dangerous encounter with Desert Sharks leads to Komatsu`s disappearance, which leads Toriko and Zebra to the foot of the Gourmet Pyramid!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Komatsu Disappears! Devilish Desert Labyrinth!
Komatsu Shissou! Ma no Desert Labyrinth!
小松失踪! 魔のデザートラビリンス!

REGULAR.description:
Komatsu is trapped within the labyrinthine Gourmet Pyramid, and only Zebra and Toriko can save him. Unfortunately, a deadly Gorgonclops and a hideous Unicorn Cerberus are standing in their way!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fuuinsareta Koe! Ikoukan Gourmet Pyramid!
The Sealed Voice! The Other-Dimensional Gourmet Pyramid!
封印された声! 異空間グルメピラミッド!

REGULAR.description:
Zebra and Toriko must eat everything in their path in order to regain the strength needed for their daring rescue mission! Meanwhile, Komatsu struggles to survive on his own!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Astounding! The Mysterious Ancient Manuscript and the Creature Inside the Coffin!
Kikikaikai! Nazo no Komonjo to Hitsugi no Naka no Seibutsu!
奇々怪々! 謎の古文書と棺の中の生物!

REGULAR.description:
Zebra and Toriko finally reunite with Komatsu, but their troubles are only just beginning. To acquire the Mellow Cola, they must defeat a ferocious Salamander Sphinx, but they have no idea how to kill it!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shocking Showdown! Salamander Sphinx!
Shougeki Taiketsu! Salamander Sphinx!
衝撃対決! サラマンダースフィンクス!

REGULAR.description:
Zebra and Toriko carry out Komatsu’s brutal orders as the little chef tells them exactly how to harvest the Mellow Cola. Their mission is on the verge of success when an unseen evil emerges!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cooperative Cooking! Komatsu Manages Toriko and Zebra!
Renkei Chouri! Komatsu ga Ayatsuru Toriko to Zebra!
連携調理! 小松が操るトリコとゼブラ!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko and Zebra must work together to defeat the mysterious monster that attacked Komatsu. There`s just one problem: the two warriors are completely out of energy!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Explosion of Combination Techniques! We Get the World`s Best Cola!
Gattai Waza Sakuretsu! Sekaiichi no Cola Itadakimasu!
合体技炸裂! 世界一のコーラいただきます!

REGULAR.description:
Komatsu must find the courage to stand up to Zebra and tell the truth about who he wants to be his partner. Later, the horrifying identity of the mysterious monster from the Gourmet Pyramid is finally revealed!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akasareru Shinsou! Komatsu no Ishi to Nazo no Seibutsu no Shoutai!
The Truth Revealed! Komatsu`s Will and the Identity of the Mysterious Creature!
明かされる真相! 小松の意志と謎の生物の正体!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko`s trip to the beach turns into an adventure when he agrees to help his favorite curry shop track down some much needed - and very dangerous - ingredients! First on the list: Water Tiger!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chichi o Koero! Manatsu no Gatsu Katsu Curry!
Surpass Dad! Midsummer Gobbling Katsu Curry!
父を超えろ! 真夏のガツカツカレー!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko continues his heated battle with powerful Water Tiger, and Komatsu helps a heartbroken chef find the amazing curry cooking skills locked inside him!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Ties That Bind! Superb Gobbling Katsu Curry!
Tsunagaru Kizuna! Zeppin Gatsu Katsu Curry!
つながる絆! 絶品ガツカツカレー!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko`s quest to get stronger leads the dynamic culinary duo to a remote cafe in the middle of a jet black lake. The food is fantastic, but the clientele is deadly!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: New Phase! Toriko`s Decision and the Reunion with `Him`!
Shinkyokumen! Toriko no Ketsui to "Yatsu" to no Saikai!
新局面! トリコの決意と"奴"との再会!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko and Komatsu visit the legendary Gourmet Shrine where they seek to increase their food luck! After sampling many delicacies and taking in the sights, Komatsu takes center stage for a surprising feat of strength!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Afureru Shokuun! Junrei Gourmet Jinja!
Food Luck Runneth Over! Pilgrimage to the Gourmet Shrine!
あふれる食運! 巡礼グルメ神社!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko and Komatsu hope to have the element of surprise on their side as they travel to the explosive Battle Island in search of the legendary Stun Apple!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Uwaa! Gyouten Bikkuri Apple!
Uwaaa! Astonishing Stun Apple!
ウワーッ! 仰天ビックリアップル!

REGULAR.description:
After his recent lottery win, Komatsu wants to buy Toriko a gift. There`s just one problem. The legendary gourmet hunter has his heart set on a priceless piece of land where the Chicken Beast lays its eggs!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chicken Beast`s Egg! The Memories of Old Man Yocchi and His Wife!
Niwatora no Tamago! Yocchi Jiisan to Tsuma no Kioku
ニワトラの卵! よっち爺さんと妻の記憶

REGULAR.description:
Toriko, Komatsu, and Sunny embark on a hair-raising quest to track down the Shining Gourami, an extremely rare sea creature that lives deep within Death Falls!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Glittering Crystal! Shining Gourami!
Suishou no Kagayaki! Sansan Gourami!
水晶の輝き! サンサングラミー!

REGULAR.description:
As the quest for the Shining Gourami continues, Toriko grows more and more impressed with Sunny`s training. An unexpected battle with a Hippo Shark gives the rainbow-haired gourmet hunter a chance to show off his strength!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shocking Rapids! Giant Waterfall, Death Falls!
Shougeki no Gekiryuu! Kyodaidaki Death Fall!
衝撃の激流! 巨大滝デスフォール!

REGULAR.description:
The devastating power of Death Falls sends Sunny into a flashback where he reflects on the days spent battling beasts and honing his instincts on the Road of Three Hells!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sunny Shinwaza! Kareinaru Shugyou no Seika!
Sunny`s New Attack! The Result of Gorgeous Training!
サニー新技! 華麗なる修業の成果!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko and Sunny must team up for a powerful combination move that`s their only hope for surviving the journey through Death Falls! But even if they reach the other side, they`ll need help to capture their prey.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gattai 30-bai! 36-ren Twin Kugi Punch!
Thirty Times Combo! Thirty-Six-Fold Twin Spiked Punch!
合体30倍! 36連ツイン釘パンチ!

REGULAR.description:
Komatsu takes center stage as the little chef struggles to unlock the secret to preparing the Shining Gourami! Toriko and Sunny are exhausted and hungry, and Komatsu must listen to his ingredients if he wants to feed his friends!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Choukkan Chouri! Komatsu to Sansan Gourami!
Cooking by Intuition! Komatsu and the Shining Gourami!
直観調理! 小松とサンサングラミー!

REGULAR.description:
When Melk the Second needs help finishing a very special knife, Toriko and Komatsu compete in a prestigious competition in an attempt to win the final ingredient needed to complete her project!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Do Hade Enshutsu! Shokuji ni Saikou no Service o!
Flashy Presentation! Supreme Service with a Meal!
ド派手演出! 食事に最高のサービスを!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko and Komatsu are asked to track down the ingredients for a very special batch of candy, but the most unlikely of heroes ends up saving the day!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gokujou no Chitose Ame! Komatsu to Yun no Monogatari!
Supreme Chitose Ame! Komatsu and Yun`s Tale!
極上の千歳飴! 小松とユンの物語

REGULAR.description:
Toriko, Coco, and Sunny race to see who`ll be first to capture a delicious Supear, but their adventure takes a dangerous turn when Komatsu is abducted by Mutton Boars!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akiyama ni Shuugou! Terry Yun Kiss Quin!
Assemble on Autumn Mountain! Terry, Yun, Kiss, Queen!
秋山に集合! テリー・ユン・キッス・クイン!

REGULAR.description:
A sinister force is abducting the top chefs in the world, and an old friend of Komatsu’s may be in great danger! Elsewhere, Toriko and Coco attempt to capture a rare appetizer!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Reunion! Take-chan of Fairytale Castle!
Saikai! Otogi no Shiro no Take-chan!
再会! オトギの城の竹ちゃん!

REGULAR.description:
Komatsu is shocked by the lack of culinary honor exhibited by his old friend. Meanwhile, Toriko and Coco team up to open a giant treasure chest - but what they find inside leaves them baffled!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Crossroads! A Chef`s Destination!
Wakare Michi! Ryourinin no Mezasu Saki!
分かれ道! 料理人のめざす先

REGULAR.description:
Toriko and Komatsu reunite for some much needed rest and relaxation at a gourmet barber shop. The food is superb, but their hair may never recover!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dramatic Transformation! Hair Salon Barber Gourmet!
Gekiteki Henshin! Biyoushitsu Barber Gourmet!
劇的変身! 美容室バーバーグルメ!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko, Sunny, Coco, and Komatsu brave frigid temperatures and Bison Frogs as they search for a legendary tree that`s entirely edible!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gathering of the Four Kings! A Midwinter Night`s Miracle!
Shitennou Shoushuu! Mafuyu no Yoru no Kiseki!
四天王招集! 真冬の夜の奇跡!

REGULAR.description:
Chief recruits Toriko and the whole gang to help spread tasty Christmas cheer to hungry kids across the world! Even Zebra manages a good deed by mistake, and the holiday ends with a delicious miracle!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Merry Feastmas! Gourmet Santa`s Present!
Merry Itadakimasu! Gourmet Santa no Okurimono!
メリーイタダキマス! グルメサンタの贈り物!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko, Komatsu, and Coco venture into the Pleasure Zone on quest to track down some extremely rare Meteor Garlic, but they soon cross paths with an old friend who could use their help!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Heaven or Hell?! Storming Into the Gourmet Casino!
Tengoku ka Jigoku ka!? Totsunyuu, Gourmet Casino!
天国か地獄か!? 突入, グルメカジノ!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko and the gang make a splash at the casino as they attempt to win enough cash and ingredients to be gain admittance to the VIP area, but what lies ahead could prove deadly!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Enter: The Boss of the Underground Cooking World, Livebearer!
Toujou! Chikaryourikai Boss, Livebearer!
登場! 地下料理界ボス, ライブベアラー!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko, Komatsu, and Coco go head-to-head with Livebearer in a game of Gourmet Memory that could cost the loser all their memories of ever eating food!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Inochigake no Card Game! Gourmet Tasting!
Life and Death Card Game! Gourmet Tasting!
命がけのカードゲーム! グルメテイスティング!

REGULAR.description:
Coco and Livebearer continue their epic showdown, but Toriko does most of the heavy lifting, devouring a mountain of pudding and handful of acorns as hard as bullets!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dead Heat! Coco Tai Livebearer
Dead Heat! Coco vs. Livebearer!
デッドヒート! ココVS[たい]ライブベアラー

REGULAR.description:
The deadly game unfolding between Coco and Livebearer reaches an unprecedented level of danger as Toriko must face off against a fearsome Hanya Panda to avoid the agony of defeat!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Coco no Sakuryaku! Shoubu o Kimeru Hazure Shokuzai!
Coco`s Gambit! The Ingredients That Determine Victory or Defeat!
ココの策略! 勝負を決めるハズレ食材!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko`s slugfest with the Hanya Panda proves to be more brutal than expected, and even if he survives, the difference between victory and defeat may ultimately lie with Komatsu!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eat or Be Eaten! Toriko vs. Hanya Panda!
Kuu ka Kuwareru ka! Toriko VS Hannya Panda!
食うか食われるか! トリコVS般若パンダ!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko keeps his team in the game by surviving mouthfuls of Shock Lemons and Nitro Cherries, but if Livebearer can withstand a bite of poison potato - all will be lost!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Climax! Nokosareta Saiaku no Shokuzai!
Climax! The Last, Most Terrible Ingredients!
クライマックス! 残された最悪の食材!

REGULAR.description:
The true genius of Coco`s plan is finally revealed as Livebearer finds himself unable to eat the poison potato, but the memory-devouring madman won`t go down without a fight!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kecchaku no Toki! Coco no Souzetsunaru Scenario!
The Moment of Truth! Coco`s Daring Scenario!
決着の時! ココの壮絶なるシナリオ!

REGULAR.description:
Komatsu gets help preparing the Meteor Garlic from a very unexpected source, and Granny Setsu is paid a visit by the IGO!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Taste That`s out of This World! Eating the Meteor Garlic!
Umaki Uchuukyuu! Jisshoku Meteor Garlic!
うまさ宇宙級! 実食メテオガーリック!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko searches for more training ingredients, Komatsu impresses his boss with dazzling new cooking techniques, and Ichiryu comes face-to-face with an old nemesis!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Choujou Taiketsu! Ichiryuu Tai Bishokukai Midora!
Showdown at the Summit! Ichiryu vs. Midora of the Gourmet Corp.!
頂上対決! 一龍VS[たい]美食會・三虎!

REGULAR.description:
Before beginning the search for his next training ingredient, Toriko must defeat a ferocious Devil Planet Horse and then dine with a fortune telling sushi chef!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hidden Training Ingredient! Emergency Instruction from Ichiryu!
Kakusareta Shugyou Shokuzai! Ichiryuu kara no Kinkyuu Shirei!
隠された修業食材! 一龍からの緊急指令!
Hashire Saikyou Gundan! Toriko to Luffy to Gokuu!
Run, Strongest Army! Toriko, Luffy, and Gokuu!
走れ最強軍団! トリコとルフィと悟空!

REGULAR.description:
In order to find the next training ingredient, Toriko must first get a hold of a Fortune Roll. To that end, Ichiryu gives him emergency instructions: capture the Mistress of the Pond, Madam Fish. And with the rest of the Four Kings?! Is that really a good idea?! In the end, will Toriko and the others be able to carry out their mission?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hyakkai Kinen de Shitennou Zen`in Daishuugou!
The Four Kings Assemble to Mark the 100th Episode!
百回記念で四天王全員大集合!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko and Komatsu are on the trail of two ingredients needed for the Fortune Roll, which when completed should tell the exact location of one of the last training ingredients. Their first stop is Firewater Island, but can they stop drinking booze long enough to focus on their goal?! Later, Toriko and Komatsu go after the stinkiest ingredient in the world, a Durian Bomb!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Toriko Faints in Agony?! Capture the World`s Stinkiest Ingredient!
Toriko Monzetsu!? Sekaiichi Kusai Shokuzai o Hokaku Seyo!
トリコ悶絶!? 世界一臭い食材を捕獲せよ!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko and Komatsu need to obtain just one more ingredient for sushi chef/fortune teller Monchy to make the Fortune Roll! On the way, they meet old friends (and a friendly rival) before traveling to Eco City, home to Monchy`s double(?!) and lots of eco-friendly animals!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dekasugi! Prowres Waza de Kyodai Ehoumaki Kansei!!
Too Huge! The Giant Fortune Roll, Completed with a Pro Wrestling Move!
デカすぎ! プロレス技で巨大恵方巻き完成!!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko and Komatsu follow the giant Fortune Roll, eating along the way towards the next training ingredient found somewhere in the Lost Forest... Bubble Fruit! But somehow they encounter a restaurant that vanishes at will and food that`s more difficult to eat than anything they`ve had before!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gasshou Ichirei! Bishoku Ningen Kokuhou Chin Chinchin Toujou!!
Put Your Hands Together and Bow! Gourmet National Treasure, Chin Chin-Chin, Appears!
合掌一礼! 美食人間国宝・珍鎮々登場!!

REGULAR.description:
Master Chin takes Toriko and Komatsu to Chowlin Temple, but the temple itself attacks them and won`t let up, never mind let them in, unless they can manage to feel grateful to everything. The temple isn`t the only thing that`s dangerous, though, as Toriko and Komatsu learn there`s more to Chin than meets the eye.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kanshanaki Mono Hairubekarazu! Kyoufu no Shokurinji!!
People Without Gratitude Aren`t Welcome! Terrifying Chowlin Temple!
感謝なき者入るべからず! 恐怖の食林寺!!

REGULAR.description:
Both Toriko and Komatsu are forced to face off against their Honoring the Food instructor, Shu! Komatsu is worried about Shu`s welfare (and sanity) as the teacher engages in a no-holds-barred fight with Toriko. And then, Toriko has the utmost confidence in Komatsu as the chef goes head-to-head against Shu in a chop-off! Will both students be taken down a peg?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Toriko Kanzen Haiboku!? Sensai Katsu Goukai, Shokugi no Iryoku!!
Toriko Totally Defeated?! The Delicate and Dynamic Power of Honoring the Food!
トリコ完全敗北!? 繊細かつ豪快, 食義の威力!!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko and Komatsu train in earnest to master the art of Honoring the Food, but will they starve to death first?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gratitude Is What Counts! The Secret to Honoring the Food!
Kansha Aru nomi! Shokugi no Gokui!!
感謝あるのみ! 食義の極意!!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko is one step away from obtaining Bubble Fruit... or maybe that`s a million or billion steps, since Bubble Way, the path that leads to the training ingredient, seems to be never-ending. It seems the key to reaching his goal is mastering the secret technique of Food`s End!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Approaching Threat! Hurry, Toriko! The Path to the Bubble Fruit!
Semaru Kyoui! Isoge, Toriko! Shabon Fruits e no Michi!
迫る脅威! いそげ, トリコ! シャボンフルーツへの道!

REGULAR.description:
Will Toriko finally reach the end of Bubble Way and get the Bubble Fruit, or starve to death first? Meanwhile, the assault on Chowlin Temple is well underway, with monsters and led by Chiyo, who`s so good with knives that she can fillet a person without them even noticing!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sangeki! Shokurinji no Shuuen... Saraba, Komatsu!!
Tragedy! The End of Chowlin Temple! Farewell, Komatsu!
惨劇! 食林寺の終焉... さらば, 小松!!

REGULAR.description:
Master Chin arrives back at the devastated Chowlin Temple and takes on the leader of the attackers, Chiyo, a famous, super-powerful chef who somehow fell in with Gourmet Corp. A rejuvenated Toriko also come back from his long hike down Bubble Way, but waiting for him is the giant-sized Golem known as a Scum Beast!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gouriki Musou! Shokugi o Kiwameshi Mono!
Unrivaled Strength! The One Who Mastered Honoring the Food!
剛力無双! 食義を極めし者!

REGULAR.description:
Master Chin lies mortally wounded! Toriko faces off against his opponent, the master of blades, Granny Chiyo! Komatsu is devastated by how far his old friend Otake has fallen! Making matters worse, Otake`s new partner shows up... and it`s a GT Robot?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: "Kokuhoukyuu" Hitofuri Ichiokuen no Waza! Toriko Tai Chiyo-baa
"国宝級"一振り一億円の技! トリコVS千代婆
National Treasure Class One Stroke 100 Million Yen Technique! Toriko vs. Granny Chiyo!

REGULAR.description:
Master Chin`s mortal wounds are healed with a Revival Knife! He reveals to Toriko and the others what made Chiyo defect to the evil Gourmet Corp. In the Gourmet World, IGO President Ichiryu calls to order an important meeting of the members of Biotope 0. He reveals that Gourmet Corp is after a secret, powerful ingredient, so they have to get it first... except there may be a traitor in their midst!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Maboroshi no Shokuzai "Centre" Ichiryuu to Saikyou Dai 0 Biotope
The Legendary Ingredient, `Center`! Ichiryu and the Strongest Biotope, 0!
幻の食材"C(センター)" 一龍と最強第0ビオトープ

REGULAR.description:
Humanity watches in horror as the Four-Beasts easily destroy the military`s strongest weapons, but all hope is not lost - the Heavenly Kings are about to join the fight!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Densetsu no Hachi "Infini Bee" Toriko Tai Shingata GT Robo
Legendary Bee, Infinibee! Toriko vs. New-Style GT Robot!
伝説の蜂"インフィニ・ビー" トリコVS新型GTロボ

REGULAR.description:
Toriko`s battle with the new type of GT Robot ends unexpectedly, but then it`s Komatsu`s turn to step up to a challenge as he follows Granny Setsu`s recipe for All-Noodles!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Honryou Hakki! Komatsu no Shokugi - Jisshoku! Maboroshi no Men "Zenmen"
Showing His True Ability! A Taste of Komatsu`s Honoring the Food!
本領発揮! 小松の食義 実食! 幻の麺"全麺"

REGULAR.description:
The fearsome 100+ Capture Level Four-Beasts awaken and start heading for the Human World from four different directions to chow down! The IGO evacuates billions of people, but only the Four Kings can ensure their safety. Toriko and his brothers-in-arms share one last fine meal before they head out to face creatures fiercer than any they`ve encountered so far.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shitennou Shuuketsu! Gourmet-kai no Kaibutsu "Shijuu" no Mezame!
The Four Kings Assemble! The Gourmet World Monsters, the Four-Beasts, Awaken!
四天王集結! グルメ界の怪物"四獣"の目覚め!

REGULAR.description:
The military throws all of its might against the invading Four-Beasts... and if that isn`t good enough to stop them, there`s always the Four Kings: Toriko, Coco, Sunny, and Zebra!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Battle with the Existence of the Human Race on the Line! The Four-Beasts vs. the Four Kings!
Jinrui no Sonbou o Kaketa Tatakai! Shijuu Tai Shitennou!!
人類の存亡をかけた戦い! 四獣VS四天王!!

REGULAR.description:
The Four Kings go all out against their respective Four-Beasts to save the human race from being devoured! Meanwhile, Komatsu and Rin discover a startling revelation about the Four-Beasts` very nature!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Toriko, Coco, Sunny, Zebra! The Four Kings` Storming Onslaught!
Toriko, Coco, Sunny, Zebra: Shitennou, Arashi no Moukou!!
トリコ・ココ・サニー・ゼブラ 四天王, 嵐の猛攻!!

REGULAR.description:
Toriko and the other Four Kings finish their battles with the gigantic four Beasts, but little do they know that the Four-Beasts` main body is targeting the evacuated human race directly!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Toriko Aratanaru Kiki: Shinobiyoru Shijuu no Hontai!!
Toriko`s New Crisis! The Creeping Main Body of the Four-Beasts!
トリコ新たなる危機 忍び寄る四獣の本体!!

REGULAR.description:
The Four Kings have beaten the four Beasts, but now they have to go up against the actual Four-Beasts, a battle that takes place near the refugee center, Food Park Plaza! And as if the Four-Beasts isn`t tough enough, poisonous Green Rain has fallen, giving all who got wet just one hour to live... unless Komatsu can create an antidote for hundreds of millions of people first!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shijuu, Shougeki no Gattai to Green Rain!!
The Four-Beasts` Shocking Combined Form and Green Rain!
四獣, 衝撃の合体と緑の雨(グリーンレイン)!!

REGULAR.description:
The Four Kings throw everything they have against the true form of the Four-Beasts, but it still isn`t enough! Meanwhile, Komatsu and several other great chefs are about to start producing a dish that will neutralize the Green Rain`s poison, but it looks like they`ll only be able to save a fraction of the human race!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shitennou Saidai no Kyuuchi! Komatsu no Ketsui!
The Four Kings` Toughest Predicament! Komatsu`s Resolve!
四天王最大の窮地! 小松の決意!

REGULAR.description:
Chefs from all over the world have gathered to save the poisoned human race, but it all depends on Komatsu`s cooking skill!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kiseki no Shokuun de Jinrui o Sukue!!
Save Humankind with Miraculous Gourmet Luck!
奇跡の食運で人類を救え!!

REGULAR.description:
With the Four Kings on the brink of death, the Four-Beasts is triumphant, but Toriko and friends have one last trick up their sleeves to save the human race!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Burst! Curiosity About the Flavor! The Four Kings` Combined Skill!
Sakuretsu! Aji e no Koukishin! Shitennou Gattai Waza!!
炸裂! 味への好奇心! 四天王合体技!!

REGULAR.description:
The Four Kings turn the tables on the apex predator of the Human World, Four-Beasts, by unleashing the secret technique, Meal Fit for a King. It looks like humanity has dodged a bullet this time, but the grand manipulator behind Four Beasts is lurking around...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ougi "Oushoku Bansan"
Secret Technique: Meal Fit for a King!
奥義 "王食晩餐"

REGULAR.description:
Fortunately, Teppei has survived his encounter with the mastermind behind Four-Beasts, but the mysterious figure isn`t done with him yet! Then Komatsu gets some startling news from two visiting members of G7!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kitarubeki Saiten: Ugomeku "Yabai Yatsura"
The Upcoming Festival! Dangerous Wriggling Critters!
来るべき祭典 うごめく"ヤバイ奴ら"

REGULAR.description:
Toriko and a few friends track down a giant plant monster from the Gourmet World! Sunny revisits Death Falls and meets an oil artisan! Coco returns to the Gourmet Casino, where he bets against Match! And Zebra goes back to the destroyed Gourmet Pyramid, but something is still alive in there!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Toriko Tai Gourmet-kai no Kaibutsu "Monplan"
Toriko vs. the Monster of the Gourmet World, Mon Plan!
トリコVSグルメ界の怪物"モンプラン"

REGULAR.description:
Toriko unleashes a new attack against the seemingly unstoppable Mon Plan from the Gourmet World! The other members of the Four Kings track down ingredients for the Cooking Fest too, even as sinister forces gather...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Toriko Shinwaza "Nailgun"!!
Toriko`s New Attack, `Nail Gun`!
トリコ新技"ネイルガン"!!

REGULAR.description:
The Cooking Festival begins! But will Komatsu be able to get overcome his nervousness at facing off against 99 of the top-ranked chefs worldwide, while being watched by a live audience of 100 million people?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Daiharan Hisshi!? Cooking Fes Kaimaku!!
Inevitable Turmoil?! The Cooking Fest Begins!
大波乱必至!? クッキングフェス開幕!!

REGULAR.description:
The preliminary round of the Cooking Festival begins, and it`s a grueling Cooking Triathlon that will eliminate 50 of the 100 participating chefs! Will Komatsu make the cut or will his inability to swim sink his chances?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Komatsu Is in a Pinch?! Triathlon Cooking!
Komatsu Pinch!? Triathlon Cooking!
小松ピンチ!? トライアスロンクッキング!

REGULAR.description:
The strange but popular and powerful Chef Brunch enters the fray, better late than never! After hearing the Four Kings brag about Komatsu, Brunch is mighty disappointed when he first meets the last-place chef. Can Komatsu change his mind?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Densetsu no Ryourinin: Tengu no Branch, Kenzan!!
Meet Legendary Chef Brunch the Tengu!
伝説の料理人 天狗のブランチ, 見参!!

REGULAR.description: Giraffe Birds and Sand Hamsters make their presence felt, Komatsu catches a lift with Brunch, and Triathlon Cooking kicks into high gear!

titles.title: Do Hiretsu! Bakusou! Branch, Gobounuki!!
Playing Dirty! Roaring Ahead! Brunch Overtakes Everyone in a Single Spurt!
ド卑劣! 爆走! ブランチ, ごぼう抜き!!

REGULAR.description:
Komatsu`s fate is in the balance as he`s in a cook-off with Oil Artisan Wabutora that employs a giant scale and roiling flames for the chef on the losing end!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ikiru ka Shinu ka: Tenbin Death Cooking!!
Live or Die? Death in the Balance Cooking!!
生きるか死ぬか 天秤デスクッキング!!

REGULAR.description:
It`s the third round of the Cooking Fest and Toriko finally gets something to do as he teams up with Komatsu in an event called Whole Island Cooking! They choose an island with an abundance of delicious ingredients... only to find it`s actually an overabundance!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Saikyou Combi wa Dare Da? Shima o Marugoto Cooking!!
Who Are the Strongest Partners? Whole Island Cooking!
最強コンビはだれだ? 島を丸ごとクッキング!!

REGULAR.description:
Gourmet Corp. invades the Cooking Fest as Komatsu is groping around in the dark for his Darkness Cooking Duel with Zaus! Will the beginning of the final tournament also be its end?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaisen! Bishokukai, Gekiretsu no Soukougeki!!
The Outbreak of War! Gourmet Corp.`s Fierce Full-Scale Offensive!
開戦! 美食會, 激烈の総攻撃!!

REGULAR.description:
There`s pandemonium at Cooking Stadium as Gourmet Corp. and their menagerie disrupt the Cooking Fest and threaten to eat the millions of spectators! Meanwhile, the Four Kings are doing everything they can to keep Komatsu from being kidnapped by Starjun!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Komatsu o Mamore! Toriko Tai Starjun!!
Protect Komatsu! Toriko vs. Starjun!
小松を守れ! トリコVSスタージュン!!

REGULAR.description:
When they first met, Starjun didn`t give Toriko a second glance. Now, in the pandemonium that has become of the Cooking Festival, Toriko shows what he`s learned to Vice-chef Starjun in a fierce battle. And if Toriko loses, Komatsu will be made the next captive chef of Gourmet Corp.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Savage Battle! Toriko`s Strongest Attack!
Yasei no Tatakai! Toriko, Saikyou Kougeki!!
野生の闘い! トリコ, 最強攻撃!!

REGULAR.description:
Battles are going on all over Cooking Stadium! Toriko is in an escalating fight with Starjun, but is already almost out of energy! And Mansom has unleashed his true potential to wipe out an army of giant GT Robots, but that also means losing control of himself!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Choujou Kessen! IGO Tai Bishokukai
Climactic Battle! IGO versus Gourmet Corp.!
頂上決戦! IGO VS 美食會

REGULAR.description:
When the chefs and Gourmet Hunters start holding their own against the Gourmet Corp. horde, the latter puts into play its deadliest trump card, the savage, well-nigh invincible Nitro! Plus, the ultimate match-up between Toriko and Starjun continues!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Saiaku no Kirifuda! Gourmet Kai no Kaibutsu "Nitro"
Worst Trump Card! The Gourmet World Monster, "Nitro"!
最悪の切り札! グルメ界の怪物"ニトロ"

REGULAR.description:
Only Coco stands between Komatsu and Grinpatch, but the gluttonous Vice-chef can`t get enough of Coco`s poison! Coco imparts an urgent oracular message to Komatsu, then stakes his life on one last shot, but first he needs to take Grinpatch far, far away...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mortal Combat! Coco vs. Grinpatch!
Shitou! Coco Tai Grinparch
死闘! ココVS[たい]グリンパーチ

REGULAR.description:
Sunny squares off against Tommyrod, master of disgusting bugs! Tommyrod`s insect arsenal has expanded since he last fought Toriko, but Sunny also has a new power... except instead of controlling it, the power may end up controlling him!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Duel! Sunny vs. Tommyrod!
Kettou! Sunny Tai Tommyrod
決闘! サニーVS[たい]トミーロッド

REGULAR.description:
The conclusion to the epic battle between Sunny and Tommyrod! Komatsu`s old friend stumbles onto a conspiracy that overshadows both IGO and Gourmet Corp.! And Brunch pits his electric-based powers against Elg, an immortal centaur!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kecchaku no Toki! Sunny, Saigo no Chikara!!
The End Is Here! Sunny`s Final Power!
決着の時! サニー, 最後の力!!

REGULAR.description:
Zebra takes on all of Gourmet Corp.`s Nitro at once! Plus, Setsuno versus her old rival, Chiyo! Traitors are revealed within the ranks of IGO! And Komatsu sees a startling sight!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Counterattack! Zebra Starts Up!
Gyakushuu! Zebra Shidou!!
逆襲! ゼブラ始動!!

REGULAR.description:
Komatsu arrives just in time to see Starjun murder Toriko... except the end of the battle proves to be just the beginning, as Toriko comes back thanks to striking a bargain with his "inner demon"! Now it`s Toriko`s turn to show what he learned from Aimaru... the Ultimate Routine!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Toriko Strikes Back! Ultimate Routine!
Toriko, Hangeki! Ultimate Routine!!
トリコ, 反撃! アルティメットルーティーン!!

REGULAR.description:
The fiery battle between Toriko and Starjun ends here! Will either one of them be able to walk away? And Joie, the power and enigmatic Dark Chef, leader of NEO, appears, but for what purpose? Other than trying to kill Setsuno, that is...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shijou Saidai no Teki! "Joa" Shutsugen!!
The Greatest Enemy in History! "Joie" Appears!
史上最大の敵! "ジョア"出現!!

REGULAR.description:
Knocking Master Jiro comes to Setsuno`s rescue against the mysterious and utterly powerful Joie! Will Jiro be able to unmask this new interloper? Meanwhile, Ichiryu and Midora begin their final face-off in the Gourmet World!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyougaku! Kuromaku "Joa" no Shoutai!!
Shock! The True Identity of the Mastermind, "Joie"!
驚愕! 黒幕"ジョア"の正体!!

REGULAR.description:
Joie intends to abduct Komatsu, an idea that both Toriko and Starjun are dead-set against! Meanwhile, the final battle between Ichiryu and Midora rages on! Plus, learn about the connection between these two leaders and Acacia!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Owari no Hajimari! Toriko Tai Joa!!
The Beginning of the End! Toriko vs. Joie!
終わりの始まり! トリコVS[たい]ジョア!!

REGULAR.description:
The Four Kings fight together against Joie, the strongest enemy they`ve ever faced and one who can`t be eaten! Meanwhile, NEO gets ready to leave the chaos of the stadium and indeed the Human World behind them, but they also plan to take Komatsu with them, whether he`s willing or not!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kishikaisei no Ichigeki! Shitennou, Kyuukyoku Waza!!
Resuscitation Strike! The Four Kings` Ultimate Skill!
起死回生の一撃! 四天王, 究極技!!

REGULAR.description:
With the Four Kings utterly defeated, Joie is about to take Komatsu away, until Toriko tries one last, desperate gambit, which could make him lose control of himself and kill even his dearest friends! Meanwhile, the final battle between Ichiryu and Midora ends with a bang!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Be Heard, Komatsu`s Scream! Toriko Revives!
Todoke, Komatsu no Sakebi! Toriko Kakusei!!
届け, 小松の叫び! トリコ覚醒!!

REGULAR.description:
The finale of the battle between Toriko and Joie! The Human World is devastated by a storm of mysterious meteorites! Amongst a backdrop of hope, forgiveness, and devious plans, Toriko and Komatsu embark on their greatest challenge: surviving a new world!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Toriko and Komatsu Embark on a New Voyage!
Toriko to Komatsu: Arata na Tabi no Shuppatsu!!
トリコと小松 新たな旅の出発!!
